summary: This model was originally created by richardphat. This author was unable to complete texturing and model importation into Skyrim. I decided it was time for a little side project, so I picked up where he left off.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static1.nexusmods.com/110/images/110/1520317-1359180179.jpg[/img]

This model was originally created by richardphat. This author was unable to complete texturing and model importation into Skyrim. I decided it was time for a little side project, so I picked up where he left off.


[color=yellow][b]THIS MOD INCLUDES[/b][/color]

Guan Dao 2 handed weapon


[color=yellow][b]CRAFTING[/b][/color]

Forge Category: Iron

2 Leather Strips
2 Iron Ingots
2 Firewood


[color=yellow][b]TEMPERING[/b][/color]

At a Grindstone:

1 Iron ingot


[color=yellow][b]WORLD MODEL LOCATION[/b][/color]

Inside Katlas Farm under the staircase


[color=yellow][b]INSTALL/UNINSTALL[/b][/color]

Option 1: Use Nexus Mod Manager to install and un-install automatically

Option 2: Manually place/remove the Guan Dao.esp to/from your Data directory
              Manually place/remove the GuanDao textures folder to/from your Data directory
              Manually place/remove the GuanDao meshes folder to/from your Data directory
              Install/Un-install complete


[color=yellow][b]CREDITS[/b][/color]

clintmich - Author
richardphat - Model creator ORIGINAL Guan Dao .OBJ Here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30440
Bethesda - For skyrim and the CK
Gamers - This means you!! Thanks for downloading and using the mods I create. You keep me motivated to create more!
Gimp - For an Awesome free image manipulation program
Blender - For an Awesome free modeling program
3dsMax - For a great free student version
NifSkope - For a great free 3D modeling editor
Nexus Sites - For hosting the greatest modding site on the net. And for a magnificent modding community.


v1.0
clintmich
2013

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


[color=yellow][b]ORIGINAL README BY richardphat[/b][/color]

You are permitted to alter/modify and distribute for Non commercial purpose.
You don\'t have to ask the permission if you want to share online, just link or include the original zip files in your work.


The head model has been based on the tribal dragon, from Baldwin A. Saintilus ( aka knight28 from devianart)
and with his authorization, I am posting my work in public.

Sincerely, Richard Nguyen



For question, please send a message to richardphat@hotmail.com with [Skyrim] in the subject. Any constructive comments are always welcomed.


-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
author: clintmich
